title.narrative: Young African Leaders Initiative (YALI)- MA-TLA-LONG- Leather Production

description.narrative: Ma-tla-long's vision is to produce quality leather through environmentally friendly practices. Ma-tla-long is passionate about creating a collection system of skin/hide from the southern region abattoirs, local butchers, farmers and the community at large to "re-cycle" skin. Once the business model is effective a sustainable network will gradually lead to an expansion of the business model towards a tannery to meet the demand of leather.
